**Example 1: 停止白板推流**



Input: 

```
tccli tiw StopWhiteboardPush --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --SdkAppId 1400000001 \
    --TaskId 07b4c70bpafm1b4majmb
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Backup": "{\"RequestId\":\"87c334b8-dbf6-4013-8d65-9a9ea60eff27\"}",
        "RequestId": "eac6b301-a322-493a-8e36-83b295459397"
    }
}
```
